article.title: Northrop Grumman to Begin Testing of Multirole Data Link System for Army
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Northrop Grumman Corporation has received a contract to developmentally test and operationally test the U.S. Army's Multirole Tactical Common Data Link. The Defense Microelectronics Activity awarded the 30-month, $69 million contract to support the Army's Communications-Electronics Research, Development and Engineering Center.
